channel.title: Need runserver that works
channel.description:
I need a runserver that work other then this one
this is my one now
@echo off title Run server java -cp .;./classes; server pause
anyone help?? source:allstar-scape2

item.title: Need runserver that works
item.dc:creator: @ricky_james ricky james
item.description:
@ricky_james wrote:

[quote=“Linksbro, post:11, topic:229946”]Set your path to JDK.

Open a command prompt.

Change your Directory to your server’s folder.

Type:

java server

Enjoy.[/quote]Links i believe i posted his link didnt work so therefore there is no need for you to post on this…

Read full topic

item.title: Need runserver that works
item.dc:creator: @Linksbro Linksbro
item.description:
@Linksbro wrote:

Set your path to JDK.

Open a command prompt.

Change your Directory to your server’s folder.

Type:

java server

Enjoy.

Read full topic
